pullrequest.title: Added Dockerfile, build and run bash files

content.raw: If it's not needed we should remove it. I tried locally and it works fine without the entry point alltogether. You can see the ros-base image for an example (it doesnt source the setup file as the `ros-core` image already does it https://github.com/osrf/docker_images/blob/master/ros/kinetic/ubuntu/xenial/ros-base/Dockerfile, the same thing applies here)
content.html: If it's not needed we should remove it. I tried locally and it works fine without the entry point alltogether. You can see the ros-base image for an example (it doesnt source the setup file as the ros-core image already does it https://github.com/osrf/docker_images/blob/master/ros/kinetic/ubuntu/xenial/ros-base/Dockerfile, the same thing applies here)
